listSelection.title: Ah, you've found me! I spend most of my time here, working on weapons to make for travellers like yourself. Did you have a request?#b

choices.text: Create a Warrior weapon with a Stimulator
Create a Bowman weapon with a Stimulator
Create a Magician weapon with a Stimulator
Create a Thief weapon with a Stimulator

dialogue.text: A stimulator is a special potion that I can add into the process of creating certain items. It gives it stats as though it had dropped from a monster. However, it is possible to have no change, and it is also possible for the item to be below average. There's also a 10% chance of not getting any item when using a stimulator, so please choose wisely.

listSelection.title: Very well, then which Warrior weapon shall I work on?#b
Very well, then which Warrior weapon shall I work on?#b

Very well, then which Bowman weapon shall I work on?#b

dialogue.text: Heeere you go! What do you think? Marvellous, isn't it?
Heeere you go! What do you think? Marvellous, isn't it?
...ACK! My attention wandered, and before I knew it... Uh, sorry, but there's nothing I can do for you now.
I'm afraid my fees are non-negotiable.
Sorry, but you're missing a required item. Possibly a manual? Or one of the ores?
Verify for a slot in your inventory first.
